title: TNF Preview: Bengals-Browns Gambling Picks & DFS Advice (Football 9/17)
description:
Will Brinson and R.J. White are back to preview Week 2 of Thursday Night Football featuring the Bengals and Browns. Does Cleveland really deserve to be giving 6 points, especially with some injuries on their line? Could this be the night for career victory #1 for #1 draft pick Joe Burrow? Will and R.J. share their thoughts before hopping into player prop picks and DFS advice. Tyler Boyd could be a player to target, as well as someone else you'd likely never think of!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @rjwhite1
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
